unnormalised: Okay, Bollywood Buzz is Buzzing! (And We're Here For It!)
normalised: Okay, Bollywood Buzz is Buzzing! (And We're Here For It!)

unnormalised: Hello my darlings! Get your chai ready, because we've got some piping hot celebrity gossip straight from the filmi streets of Mumbai! First off, whispers are swirling about Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor maybe, just maybe, planning a grand anniversary bash in Udaipur? A source close to the Kapoor khandaan says they're scouting locations and apparently, Neetu Singh is all over the details, making sure everything is 'perfectly perfect.' Remember their dreamy wedding? Sigh.
normalised: Hello my darlings! Get your chai ready, because we've got some piping hot celebrity gossip straight from the filmi streets of Mumbai! First off, whispers are swirling about Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor maybe, just maybe, planning a grand anniversary bash in Udaipur? A source close to the Kapoor khandaan says they're scouting locations and apparently, Neetu Singh is all over the details, making sure everything is 'perfectly perfect.' Remember their dreamy wedding? Sigh.

unnormalised: Then there's the whole saga with Janhvi Kapoor and… well, let's just call him "Mr. Mystery Man." Paparazzi pics surfaced of them leaving a Juhu restaurant at 2 AM, holding hands! Is this a new romance brewing? Or just friendly hand-holding after too many butter chickens? The nation wants to know! My prediction? He's either a tech entrepreneur or secretly, a sheikh from Dubai visiting Mumbai on a business trip. We’ll keep digging!

unnormalised: And speaking of digging, remember that rumour about Ranveer Singh possibly considering a role in a Sanjay Leela Bhansali film again? Well, a little birdie (aka my friend who works as a light boy on sets) told me that the negotiations are still ON! Apparently, the script is inspired by some old Mughal tale, and it’s HUGE. Like, *Bahubali* huge, but with more drama, more eyeliner, and definitely more over-the-top costumes. We're talking 25000 Rs. worth of embroidery per outfit people!

unnormalised: Also, spotted Sara Ali Khan rocking a casual look outside the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi? What’s that all about? Is she researching for a new role? Or finally deciding to pursue that engineering degree her dadi always wanted her to have? Maybe a cameo role as a brilliant student in a movie? Guess we'll have to wait & watch.

unnormalised: Finally, a source tells us that Kartik Aaryan's new haircut is NOT just a haircut. It’s a *statement*. Apparently, it symbolizes a new phase in his career. A phase where he's taking on more “serious” roles. So, no more goofy characters? I'm going to miss those! Stay tuned for more juicy updates. Until next time, keep the Bollywood masala coming! Bye folks.
